1.0.name: wordpress/md-responsive-jquery-slider
1.0.description:
MD Responsive is the title that it is shown in the menus section after the plugin is activated. There are 3 sections: 1. MD Responsive (here you can see the slides saved) 2. Add New
3. Settings

The slides are saved as custom post types and the images are added using the featured image option.

Features:

Autoplay
Width (960 by default/ in px) Height (390 by default/ in px) Transition speed (5000 by default/ in miliseconds) Title (show/hide) Description (show/hide) Time delay (5000 by default/ in miliseconds) Bullet navigation (show/hide) Arrow navigation (show/hide) Show on page (automatically add the slider to the selected page) or manually on anywhere else using
